nodes.text: The Sendant Pride was a Galactic Republic military vessel that served in the Republic Navy during the Great Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. The warship was part of a massive fleet that was preparing for an invasion of the Imperial capital of Dromund Kaas, but the fleet was ambushed by the Imperial Navy near the Hoth system. The ship survived for several days until the battle reached the planet Hoth, when it was among those warships that crashed into the region later known as the Starship Graveyard during the Battle of Hoth.

The Sendant Pride appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011; the area around the ship is a subregion of the Starship Graveyard entitled "Wreckage of the Sendant Pride." The wreck was originally planned to be involved in "Recovering the Sendant Pride," a mission for Republic players, but the mission and its quest giver, Lieutenant Alden, did not appear in the final game.
